reviewText: "The Night Before" is much more than a "teen flick", it's a marvelous farce with the fresh comedic talent of a young Keanu Reeves..he's wonderful in it ! It's also a movie full of visual morsels of  humor and you'll need more than one viewing to see them all...I think this  film should be in every video collection..if you ever get sad, Keanu will  lift your spirits and make you laugh !
Title: N/A

reviewText: This movie purports to be humorous and, guess what, it is! Poor Keanu goes to the prom with the woman of his dreams only to discover she lost a bet with her friends and had to ask the least popular guy in school to the prom. Well, at least he's good looking so you can forgive him for taking a wrong turn off the freeway and ending up in a seedy adult entertainment district, and you can forgive him for getting his wallet stolen, and you can forgive him for getting plastered, and you can even almost forgive him for selling his date to a pimp for a couple of hundred dollars. His date's father is a cop, and he is not so forgiving!

reviewText: Take a cute boy and try to make him a geek. Take a spoiled rotten girl and a bad bar and what fun! Good for a laugh and you cant help but cheer him on.
summary: It was the time and these were the movies.

reviewerName: Meesha "I'm A Lonely Angel Stuck On The Slow ...
reviewText: I managed to grab this DVD from Ebay for dead cheap. Of course the back is all in a language that I can't understand, but it's great if you can grab it.The film's pretty dodgy, but that's understandable, when it's a very early, almost TV film. Keanu Reeves is pretty much terrific, apart from his hair, and his dancing! OK, so he was pretty much high as a kite at the time, but if I'd been Lori Loughlin's character, I would walked out of there, no matter how cute he was! The dancing is pretty hilarious though, and the film should be seen for that alone.Otherwise, it's a pretty average film. Not good, but not bad either. It is quite a romantic movie, but it's also extremely predictable. Good, popular girl at school falls for geeky, science class boy?! Where have I heard that one before?
Title: N/A

reviewText: What a great little gem of a movie!Keanu Reeves is Winston Connelly, school nerd, who gets to take the most popular gal in school to the Prom.  The thing is, they never get there.....I love it when they go off course  and end up in the 'wrong side of the trax'.  The disco scenes are  hillarious and when Winston bucks up with two street hoods, who've just  robbed a 'toy store' I fell about the place. 'Later oooooooooooooooon for  you!' Briliant!Keanu plays Mr Connelly with aplomb, bringing his unique,  quirky personality to the role.And he looks delicious on black  trousers.........!Whadda guy! A really goofy guy!

reviewText: Waking up with no memory of that happened the night before, Keanu Reeves is the main character who tries to back track the wild non stop laughs to find his missing date and get her back home before her parents kill him. It would be a wonderful addition to any future dvd collection if re-released.
Title: N/A

reviewText: The soundtrack alone is worth buying this movie for.  When I first saw this movie, I didn't know who PFunk was.  I did know, however, that I was hearing music I wanted to listen to again and again.  Now, PFunk is my favorite group and I can seriously say that Take Me Down Now  Baby Boy and Where The Music Comes Alive are two of the funkiest songs that I have ever heard.  Unfortunately, outside of this movie, I don't think either song has ever  been released.  In addition to doing most of the soundtrack, PFunk also  makes a cameo.  George, Bootsy and Gary are all present but they're in the  background.  While PFunk fans will want to see more of them, their  background cameos only help to make this movie work.  Unlike some of the  other movies PFunk has been in, this movie is also worth watching on it's  own merit.  I can comfortably recommend everything about this movie.  The  plot is excellent and the cast works really well.  If I tell any more about it, I'll spoil it.  If you're a PFunk fan and you haven't seen this movie, go to a video store and rent it!  I'll be surprised if you get to the end of the movie before you're back online buying it.  I look forward to the day when this movie is released on DVD.  It deserves to be.  "Funk is it's own reward."
summary: An excellent movie with an even better soundtrack!
Title: N/A

reviewText: I can't possible imagine someone thinking of Keanu Reeves as a nerd, but that's what he is in "The Night Before." The school queen Lori Loughlin, has to go to the prom with Keanu's Winston because she made a bet with friends and lost. The chain of events that happens is wacky and hilarious, and it shows Keanu at his sweatest.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am an very organized person who has an order for everything. This movie isn't like me at all (or most movies); that's what makes it so Great!"The Night Before" shakes things up and is fresh, funny,  and entertaining!  I highly recommend this movie to all comedy lovers!It is similiar to "Weekend at Bernies" in regards to the  believability of it; however, comedies are usually better when they are a  little "over the edge!"Keanu transforms from a high school  nerd into a cool big-shot "dude" who even wins over Lori's  intimidating police Dad!  Lori Loughlin is in her element in comedies; she  should have her last name changed to Laughin!You have to see this movie  everybody, it's hiliarious! (especially the car chases and the dance  scenes!)  I can't say enough about this movie! Get it? Then go get it!
summary: BREAKS ALL THE RULES! WAY TO GO!
